channel.title: Syndicate 639 24/7 Spawn Eco Pking Server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1275.photobucket.com/albums/y442/RSPSMorphineGFX/SYDNICATE639v4_zps9a94eb4e.png[/img][/center]
[size=18pt][b]Website: www.syndicate639.com Webclient: www.syndicate639.com/webclient.php Forums: www.syndicate639.com/forum[/b][/size]
STOP RIGHT THERE! Why should you join Syndicate 639? Well here are a few reasons:
-Win PayPal cash: here -Fun and unique minigames: Call of Duty Black OPs Gun Game (but with swords) and more. -Killstreaks and perks: earn bonus damage, care packages and more. -SafePK: per kill here you earn 500k x current killstreak. -Numerous dangerous PK locations: ::edge, ::mb, ::easts, ::wests etc. -Dicing: trusted players are given the official rank, although anyone may host or dice. -Choose between spawn or an economy server. -HD/fullscreen. -Player Statistics: highest hit, kills, deaths etc. -Achievements: earn achievements by completing certain tasks, with rewards. -Spawning costs coins: easy to make money, just PK at safe for no risk cash rewards! -Free welfare gear, runes and potions: for quick and easy access. Get straight to PKing for free to make your cash! -Lowest donation prices: we are not a "pay2win" server. NO "donator only" items exist -Professional: ran by adults, not kids. -Freedom: you WON'T be muted or banned for swearing or trivial matters. In fact, we don't have time for it.
Now onto some media:
[img]http://puu.sh/3NduW.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/396fq.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3O9yX.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3MZsu.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3O1hQ.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39BKP.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39BKP.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39Bum.png[/img] [youtube]http://youtu.be/3GUOm8mQHN0[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/WZZcWyCpULc[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/uLa1O9BZtOQ[/youtube]
